mapper.insert: insert into health_persinfo(id, pw, name, phone, locker, shirts, birthday) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{locker}, #{shirts}, #{birthday})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, title, readcnt, writeday, category from (select * from health_newboard where category=#{category} order by pk_num desc)) where rnum between 1 and 3
